STARS.how-would-you-rate: How would you rate the advertisement?

ERRORS.stars: Please set a star rating between one and five stars
ERRORS.date-format: The date must match dd.mm.yyyy format
ERRORS.minimum-age: You need to be at least 18 years old to use VENOVUM
ERRORS.username: Your username can only contain alphanumeric letters, ".", "-" and "_" and cannot end with ".", "-" and "_"
ERRORS.password: Your password must contain at least one uppercase, one lowercase and a special character
ERRORS.all-campaigns-watched: All campaigns watched. We will inform you, if there are any other campaigns available for you.
ERRORS.generic: There was an error. Please try again
ERRORS.add-more-answers: Please add more than one answer option
ERRORS.failed-to-update-language: Failed to update the language for you. Please try again

QUESTIONS.name: Name
QUESTIONS.question: Question
QUESTIONS.stars-description: Stars allow you to get user feedback about your video. With this option, the user can rate your video with stars. This is literally a must for every video.
QUESTIONS.multiple-choice-description: A Multiple choice question allows the user to select one of many given answers. This is one of the best options.
QUESTIONS.text-description: A Text offers the user to say something about your product. We strongly recommend you to not use this option.

CAMPAIGN.create-description: You can always create a campaign. A campaign consists of a video and a few questions. One question is free, any more will cost you. Please see our pricing model for further information.

REGISTRATION.title: Almost done
REGISTRATION.text: Please fill out the missing fields to complete your registration
REGISTRATION.success-message: You can now login with your created credentials

AUTH.changed-locale: Locale changed automatically to your preference (english)

SIGNUP.title: Get Started With Ease
SIGNUP.teaser: Just enter your email and get ready to earn some money by watching advertisement videos. We then send you an email with a link to complete your signup at VENOVUM
SIGNUP.check-inbox: Please have a look into your inbox and confirm your email

CREATECAMPAIGN.file-uploaded: File uploaded and enqueued for processing. This may take some time
